name: Strange Potions
description:
Over 40 days in the making, STRANGE POTIONS is an card-based interactive fiction (loosely) set in medieval times. Make allies and battle monsters while chugging Witches' Brew Discount Potions--bargain bin elixirs with unpredictable side effects!

❧ Experience over 32 unique randomized encounters, including Mysterious Characters, Twists of Fate, Locations to Explore, and Enemy Battles!

❧ 2 Gamemodes: "Survival" and "Potion Blitz"!

❧ 22 different Potion Ingredients, making for over 480 unique combinations!

❧ Automatically screenshots your Final Results screen for easy sharing with friends! (PC and Linux only)

❧ Absolutely FREE TO DOWNLOAD AND PLAY!

- Find a bug? Enjoy the game? Leave a rating, review, or let me know on twitter at @bubbleratgames, or via my business email, bubbleratgames@gmail.com!
